extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of C in GRMN202 or permission of the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.

basic.description: An introduction to reading, discussing and writing about German literary texts in German. Major periods, authors, and texts of the 20th century will be examined in their cultural and historical contexts. Students will be exposed to different genres: excerpts from novels and dramas as well as short stories, poems and film adaptations.
basic.subject: GRMN
basic.title: Lang & Culture 20th C. Lit
